Description.Text: ibis Styles New York LaGuardia Airport welcomes you with 93 air conditioned rooms and our exclusive design. All our prices include unlimited WiFi. Located very close to the heart of New York for family vacation or business trips always at a low cost rate. Enjoy everything the City That Never Sleeps can offer! Easy and quick access to Citi Field, USTA Billie Jean King Tennis Facility, Midtown Manhattan, vibrant Times Square, the worldwide famous 5th Avenue and so much more!
LAGUARDIA AIRPORT At 0.8km / 0.5 miles 7 TRAIN At 6.44km / 4 miles

Warm, welcoming and modern, with a comfortable bed and a practical bathroom, our rooms offer everything you need for an enjoyable stay Check In - From 4pm Check Out - Up to 11am One King Bed - Standard Room with 1 King Bed features 325 sq ft, complimentary Wi-Fi, 43 inch flat screen TV and an in-room safe. Two Full Size Beds - Room with 2 Full Size Beds features a roomy 325 sq ft with complimentary Wi-Fi, 43 inch flat screen TV and in room safe.

Restaurant - Unique and stylish, our restaurant offers a selection of international cuisine and healthy meals served with good service and at good value for money. The ideal spot to relax at the end of a busy day!
